review: I love the amazon fire stick,I just wish it was a little similar to add apps to the stick,the process is long and tedious.
author: oellis

review: My grandson would like more games and I would like to see more instruction on what can be downloaded and how.
author: Terry L. Israel

review: so  far i haven't been able to use it that much, because my kids always have it!  they love it, it is easy to use and was super simple to hook up and get started using it....for someone like me who has prime i think it is the best way to go. wish i had gotten it sooner, now i feel like i get my moneys worth with prime!
author: amazonsGR8
